content: ukraine snood this pattern is also available in english german russian spanish italian czech polish hungarian finnish click download and select language dear knitters from over the world this my pattern in english are free on ravelry i want them this pattern to remain available all over the world knit translate into other languages share think about ukraine the italian version contains typos should be 1 page 2 ferro 5 rl pass 1 m a dir 1 dir ddd 1 rov pass 1 m a rov con il filo davanti 1 rov ddd 1 dir pass 1 m a rov con il filo davanti = 11m 2 page 6 parte 18 foglia - - inizio rl passare 1 m a dir 70 dir 1 rov passare 1 m a rov con il filo davanti 1 rov 70 dir pass 1 m a rov con il filo davanti girare il lavoro typo should be part 3 leaf yarn b start ws sl1k k23 sl1p wyif k22 w&t/ «leaf motif»/ k22 sl1p wyif turn work yarn a schoppel wolle admiral col 4780 - 100g 420m b lang linello col 0050 - 170g 480m i did not find a suitable yellow yarn and used this color but i removed the lilac areas you can use any other yellow yarn you will need approximately 450 - 480 meters size width - 170cm / height - 60 cm circular knitting needles 2 5 mm long - 60cm or use long double pointed needles gauge 26sts and 35 row = 10 cm х 10 cm abbreviations co = cast on bobble = bind off k = knit p = purl kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch sl1k = slip a stitch knit-wise st s = stitch es sl1p = slip a stitch purl-wise rn= right needle ln= left needle rs = right side ws = wrong side w&t = wrap and turn wyif = with yarn in front / = next cdd = k3tog with centered double decreases ---- auch auf **deutsch** verfügbar damit ihr auch wißt was ihr mit den neuen ukrainischen farben von der wollmeise anfangen könnt
